tasks.label: build-doc-docker-pdf
tasks.command: docker run --rm --user $(id -u):$(id -g) -e HOME=/tmp -v ${workspaceFolder}:/documents asciidoctor/docker-asciidoctor asciidoctor-pdf -r asciidoctor-mathematical -a mathematical-format=svg --base-dir /documents/docs --destination-dir /documents/build/pdf --failure-level WARN --verbose docs/index.adoc

tasks.label: build-doc-docker-html
tasks.command: docker run --rm --user $(id -u):$(id -g) -e HOME=/tmp -v ${workspaceFolder}:/documents asciidoctor/docker-asciidoctor asciidoctor --base-dir /documents/docs --destination-dir /documents/build/html --failure-level WARN --verbose docs/index.adoc
